name: webtrees
description: webtrees is a self-hosted genealogy application that lets users build and explore family trees online. It supports GEDCOM imports, collaboration, and detailed person records via a web interface.
features: Family tree building: Create comprehensive family trees with individuals, relationships, and multiple generations.
GEDCOM support: Import and export family data using the standard GEDCOM format for compatibility with other tools.
Media management: Attach photos, documents, and videos to individuals and events for rich family histories.
Collaborative editing: Allow multiple family members to contribute and edit the family tree simultaneously.
Privacy controls: Set visibility levels for living individuals to protect privacy while sharing historical data.
Timeline views: Visualize family history with interactive timelines showing births, marriages, and deaths.
Relationship calculator: Determine how any two individuals in the tree are related with detailed relationship paths.
Research tools: Track sources, citations, and research notes to document the evidence for family connections.
Statistics reports: Generate reports showing family statistics, most common names, and demographic trends.
Multi-language support: Display the interface in dozens of languages for international family collaboration.
Custom themes: Personalize the appearance with themes and color schemes to match family preferences.
Search functionality: Find individuals quickly by name, date, place, or other attributes across the entire tree.
